item.title: Code Retreat Global Day: Retrospective
item.author: Author
item.description: Yesterday was the day. I had been waiting for it for a long time. Lots of people join together all around the world to improve their skills as Developers. I had the chance of attending the Madrid meeting. It was carried on by Enrique Comba. There I found a lot of people that I met first time in another Code Retreat, a year ago. I met new people too. My first thought was that I must not to be there.
